overview: Citas is a rich but very spoiled girl who insists on marrying a man who is obviously only after her money. While holed up in their vacation house in Baguio, she manages to escape and in a bus, meets a seasoned newspaper reporter, who is in dire need of a scoop.
tagline: She's naughty, she's capricious, she's lovely, and lovable.
title: Niña Bonita
